name: Reference - Advanced device matching system
x_kb_abstract: Disclosed is a device management system for discovery and management of components added to computer systems and sub-systems. The device management system provides for recognizing a newly added component, and determining if the newly added component is already a part of the system inventory. The newly added component is matched with a component currently on the system, based on at least one matching attribute. A point total is calculated for each match level and a final match score is provided. The match score is compared with an aggressiveness level to determine if a match does indeed exist.
x_kb_author: Rajneesh Jalan, Joseph M. Schmitt, and Marco Simoes
